document.full_text: a group of lehman brothers creditors, including the largest u.s. public pension fund and hedge fund paulson & co, has asked a bankruptcy judge to consider its reorganization plan for the bankrupt company at the same time that lehman's own plan is up for consideration.
document.title: lehman creditors ask court to consider competing plans
lines_and_colors: a group of lehman brothers creditors, including the largest u.s. public pension fund and hedge fund paulson & co, has asked a bankruptcy judge to consider its reorganization plan for the bankrupt company at the same time that lehman's own plan is up for consideration.
